definition: to look after/to tend (one's crops, garden, livestock, pets etc)/to repair
to do/to manage/to handle/to play with/to fool with/to mess with/to fix/to toy with

sentences.english: It's easier to drive to the grocery store than to plant my own vegetable garden.
sentences.chinese: 開車去食品店比自己侍弄菜園子容易。

sentences.english: He took full advantage of the good weather to do some gardening.
sentences.chinese: 他利用良好的天氣侍弄花園。

sentences.english: I will tell maria and the gypsy how to handle the horses .
sentences.chinese: 我去告訴瑪麗婭和吉普賽人怎樣侍弄這些馬。

sentences.english: I do some servile tasks such as floor scrubbing and barn work.
sentences.chinese: 我做一些諸如擦地板和侍弄牲口的傭人工作。

sentences.english: I spent a lot of time thinking about my hair.
sentences.chinese: 我也花了很多時間來侍弄我的頭髮。

sentences.english: Sorry, " he said, "I can't garden with you.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，“他說，”我不能和你一起侍弄這些花草了。

definition: to clear up/to tidy up/to pick up/to repair
to tend/to take care of sb
